============
simple_stats
============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/simple_stats.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/simple_stats

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/bfulroth/simple_stats.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/bfulroth/simple_stats

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/simple-stats/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://simple-stats.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




A Python package ce containing methods for EDA, bootstrapping, and hypothesis testing


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://simple-stats.readthedocs.io.
